title: Lavish Five-Star English Castle Escape Overlooking Dartmoor National Park
description: Treat yourself to a stay fit for royalty at the boutique Bovey Castle Hotel, a luxurious historic estate nestled on 275 acres of pristine countryside. A collection of intimate rooms, perfect for a romantic getaway or cosy family escape, is peppered throughout the original manor house and surrounding mews. After the day's adventures, indulge in fine dining at the award-winning Great Western Grill restaurant, serving traditional dishes with fresh local produce.
offer_address: North Bovey, Dartmoor National Park, Newton Abbot, Devon, TQ13 8RE United Kingdom
